gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.expeditedfields
Class CaaersFieldsTree

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.expeditedfields.TreeNode
      gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.expeditedfields.CaaersFieldsTree

public class CaaersFieldsTree
extends TreeNode

The Class CaaersFieldsTree.

Author:
Sameer Sawant, Ion C. Olaru, Biju Joseph This tree represents the fields (attributes) in various pages of tabs of the caAERS UI. Its used in the page under admin to configure the various fields to make it Mandatory/ Optional/Not applicable on the page.

getPropertyValuesFrom

public org.springframework.beans.MutablePropertyValues getPropertyValuesFrom(java.lang.Object value)
Description copied from class: TreeNode
Find the property value(s) matching this node from the given object. These may not exactly match the properties returned by a simple BeanWrapper. In particular, this will be true for list properties (where the returned values will be values in the list, not the list itself) and for coded-or-other properties (where the return value will be either the coded value or the "other" value, whichever is set).

Specified by:
getPropertyValuesFrom in class TreeNode
Parameters:
value - the value
Returns:
the property values from

matchProperty

protected TreeNode matchProperty(java.lang.String desiredPropertyName)
Description copied from class: TreeNode
Finds the node (either this node or a child) which matches the given path. This is different from TreeNode.find(java.lang.String), which only matches children.

Specified by:
matchProperty in class TreeNode
Parameters:
desiredPropertyName - the desired property name
Returns:
the tree node
